line.style: stroke: rgb(185, 185, 185); stroke-dasharray: 1, 2; stroke-width: 1.204; transform-box: fill-box; transform-origin: 50% 50%;
line.title: Perforation Left

path.style: stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-width: 0.428; fill: rgb(204, 204, 204);
path.title: Fold

path.style: stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-width: 0px; fill: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.365); transform-box: fill-box; transform-origin: 50% 50%;
path.title: Fold Shadow

text.style: fill: rgb(134, 134, 134); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 2.8px; font-weight: 900; white-space: pre; visibility: hidden;
fill: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 2px; white-space: pre;

g.text: Here’s to the crazy ones, the misfits, ​the rebels, the troublemakers, the ​round pegs in the square holes… ​the ones who see things differently ​— they’re not fond of rules… ​​You can quote them, disagree with ​them, glorify or vilify them, but the ​only thing you can’t do is ignore ​them because they change things… ​they push the human race forward, ​and while some may see them as ​the crazy ones, we see genius, ​​because the ones who are crazy ​enough to think that they can change ​the world, are the ones who do.

text.style: fill: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 4px; white-space: pre;
